ABOUT:
The ABOUT field is requied in all commands and should describe that command and its fields.
It's written as an array to let you comment each argument in the command.
This comment is for the SomeMessage variable. The SomeMessage variable is an example of a string
This comment is for the Count variable which is an example of an int
This comment is for the SomeBooleanExample
This comment is for the CouldBeNothing. This is an example of an optional parameter. In this case it could be a string, or null.
This command just shows you how to put a second command into the generator json
